Northland weather: Heavy rain watch upgraded to warning, thunderstorms and strong winds to come https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-weather-region-under-heavy-rain-and-strong-wind-watch-could-be-upgraded-to-warning/L4HTRKLHGVHUXHCGMD2B6SRUV4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-weather-region-under-heavy-rain-and-strong-wind-watch-could-be-upgraded-to-warning/L4HTRKLHGVHUXHCGMD2B6SRUV4/ Brodie StoneSummer's on the back-burner as a rainmaker arrives. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 21:52:56 +0000 Forecast heavy rain and strong winds have prompted weather watches that have in some cases been upgraded to warnings for the Northland region early this week. Photo / Michael Cunningham
Group makes DIY floating picnic table with outboard motor on Auckland’s Waitematā Harbour to watch SailGP https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/boys-make-diy-floating-picnic-table-with-outboard-motor-on-aucklands-waitemata-harbour-to-watch-sailgp/C3R6FJ4GTFEQTLU5MPPDCTSRJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/boys-make-diy-floating-picnic-table-with-outboard-motor-on-aucklands-waitemata-harbour-to-watch-sailgp/C3R6FJ4GTFEQTLU5MPPDCTSRJU/ Raphael FranksA policeman on a jetski intercepted the group of men, took a photograph, and left. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 21:38:04 +0000 A group of boys fashioned themselves a front-row seat for the Sail Grand Prix in Auckland over the weekend, floating on a picnic table with an outboard motor on the city’s harbour. Photo / Ally Ford
Kiwi woman set on fire by ex-partner in Brisbane, family ‘devastated’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/kiwi-woman-set-on-fire-by-ex-partner-in-brisbane-family-devastated/M2MNSHSUDVGEZKABAGNMTAH45I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/kiwi-woman-set-on-fire-by-ex-partner-in-brisbane-family-devastated/M2MNSHSUDVGEZKABAGNMTAH45I/ A GoFundMe page for her family has already raised $20,000. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 21:35:57 +0000 Kiwi woman Destiny Otton-Rakuraku, 34, is fighting for her life in hospital after her ex-partner allegedly set her on fire.
Former minister Russell Marshall dies aged 88 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/former-minister-russell-marshall-dies-ged-88/LFXN4MV6QVFXDL6S5JFLLYTIV4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/former-minister-russell-marshall-dies-ged-88/LFXN4MV6QVFXDL6S5JFLLYTIV4/ Russell Marshall was Whanganui MP from 1972 to 1990. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 20:52:55 +0000 Former Whanganui MP and Labour Cabinet minister Russell Marshall has died.

Police investigating death at Wellington Hospital: Man brought in, dies, after fight at Hutt Hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-death-at-wellington-hospital-man-brought-in-dies-after-fight-at-hutt-hospital/O4Q3MO2I3NHVJDGVJUC7DMKTUI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-death-at-wellington-hospital-man-brought-in-dies-after-fight-at-hutt-hospital/O4Q3MO2I3NHVJDGVJUC7DMKTUI/ The victim suffered a brain injury in the fight.
